item.title: Promotion & Tenure Articles
item.description: For my Promotion & Tenure process, I was asked to identify several journal articles that exemplify my work.

item.title: Promotion & Tenure Materials
item.description: Following the example of my friend Josh Rosenberg, here I am sharing the narrative I wrote for my third-year review this month.
